name: Orbiting Cryosleeper
desc:
Cryosleeper operation brings system demographics to a new level, some say that not all is lost and the Domain times are upon us.
Only 1 per system, improves stability and unlocks growth past size 6.

name: Organ Harvesting Operations
desc: Cryosleeper has been hidden in a secret location, and the grandest organ harvesting operation has begun. Nobody can link a massive upsurge of organ supply to us, but multiple powers have stated their concern.
